CustomField.description: This field is used in a workflow rule to send an Industrial Account Outound Message to IA and to flip the record type to "Locked". Type: IA Integrated: Y
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This box is checked to send this account to IA, so that a new corresponding account is automatically created. This will cause many of the account fields to be "locked", since IA will have the "official" account data.
CustomField.label: Send Account to IA
